definition: to raise a lantern and fight at night (idiom); fig. to work into the night/to burn the midnight oil
to raise/to dig up/to poke/to prick/to incite/to stir up
to carry on a shoulder pole/to choose/to pick/to nitpick
lamp/light/lantern/CL:盞|盏[zhan3]
night
variant of 夜[ye4]
to fight/fight/war/battle

sentences.english: He has the habit of burning the midnight oil before tests.
sentences.chinese: 考试前他有挑灯夜战的习惯。

sentences.english: I have to burn the midnight oil to complete the report.
sentences.chinese: 我必须挑灯夜战来完成此报告。

sentences.english: Many corners are still on, working or corrupting.
sentences.chinese: 很多角落依然在挑灯夜战，或忙碌或堕落。

sentences.english: We have to go home and burn the midnight oil tonight.
sentences.chinese: 今晚我们必须回家挑灯夜战。

sentences.english: I have to study every night.
sentences.chinese: 我每晚都得挑灯夜战了。

sentences.english: I pulled an all-nighter to study for my English exam.
sentences.chinese: 我挑灯夜战准备我的英文考试。

sentences.english: Each of them mounted fresh horses to start the night fight.
sentences.chinese: 二人各换一匹马，开始了挑灯夜战。

sentences.english: He used to burn the midnight oil before exam.
sentences.chinese: 他过去考试前总要挑灯夜战。

sentences.english: More and more pupils are burning the midnight oil.
sentences.chinese: 愈来愈多的学生都在挑灯夜战。

definition: to stay up through the night (idiom)
to light a lamp/to raise a lantern
night and day (idiom); continuous strenuous effort
overnight until daybreak (idiom); all night long/day and night
to write at a tremendous speed
to be sleepless all night
to neglect sleep and forget about food (idiom)/to skip one's sleep and meals/to be completely wrapped up in one's work
to burn the midnight oil (idiom); to work continuously night and day
all night/throughout the night
to travel or work through night and day/to toil away for long hours
the whole night
lit. to gnaw a book/to study/to cram
to study assiduously and tirelessly (idiom)/see also 頭懸梁，錐刺股|头悬梁，锥刺股[tou2 xuan2 liang2 , zhui1 ci4 gu3]
day and night/regardless of the time of day or night
to bend over one's desk (writing, studying, taking a nap etc)
to toss and turn restlessly (in the bed)
